25.ara-name: كتاب الأطعمة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Khaldah:That Abu Al-'Aliyah said: "garlic is among the good provisions." Abu Khaldah's name is Khalid bin Dinar, and he is trustworthy according to the people of Hadith. He saw Anas bin Malik and heard narrations from him. Abu Al-'Aliyah's name is Rufai' and he is Ar-Riyahi. 'Abdur-Rahman bin Mahdi said: "Abu Khaldah was preferable, reliable

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرُّخْصَةِ فِي الثُّومِ مَطْبُوخًا
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Permission To Eat Cooked Garlic
